description: Main activity for an Android TV app, handling UI setup and remote control key events.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main Activity class extending FragmentActivity for Android TV, manages UI and key events.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Lifecycle method initializing UI components and setting the activity's layout.

methods.name: onKeyDown
methods.description: Handles remote control key events such as ENTER, BACK, and navigation keys.
